means: 组成公司( incorporate的过去式和过去分词 )
（用于公司名称后）组成公司的，股份有限的

sentence.Network_en: New guns firing high explosive shells were incorporated into the battlefield.
sentence.Network_cn: 发射高爆弹的新型大炮在战场上得到了使用。

sentence.Network_en: There are two main structuralist techniques incorporated into critical social research.
sentence.Network_cn: 批判性社会研究中融入了两种主要的结构主义分析技巧。

sentence.Network_en: Many of your suggestions have been incorporated in the plan.
sentence.Network_cn: 你的很多建议已纳入计划中。

entry.tran: (用于公司名称后)组成公司的，股份有限的
entry.def: Incorporated is used after a company's name to show that it is a legally established company in the United States.

means.word_mean: 1. formed or united into a whole
2. organized and maintained as a legal corporation;

sentences.sentence: "a special agency set up in corporate form"

means.word_mean: 3. introduced into as a part of the whole;

sentences.sentence: "the ideas incorporated in his revised manuscript"

auth_sentence.content: She is a body and is incorporated in Christ.

auth_sentence.content: But the models haven't incorporated new deep-water simulations.
